alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Denver (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 3:42PM MDT until May 25 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Denver County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 341 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southeastern Englewood, or 6 miles south of Denver, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Denver, northeastern Littleton, Englewood, Greenwood Village and Sheridan. This storm will mainly affect the southwestern half of the city of Denver. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
